OOC: Well, looks like that pesky Hurricane has passed me by....

    Aracnia looked up to see Inferno march down the corridor like a soldier. 
She couldnt belive what an idiot he was, but she was glad to have him on her 
side. He came closer, stopped, saluted, and stood tall.
    "Royalty! I have come to inform you that Rampage awaits your arrival. The 
ship is up and running and armed." He said, not stumbling over words and 
being very tact.
    Aracnia shighed. " Excellent, we are beginning the moving process now. 
Unfortuetly, Kitkats groups has declined my offer. I guess the bunker will 
have to remain empty." She said looking around.
    Inferno then looked around. THe bunker was big, but the ship was much 
better. "Shall I do anything for you, my Queen?"
    Aracnia thought a moment. "Yes, take the three Maximal prisoners to the 
ship with you. Aerostreak, Paralysis, and when Tarantulas gets back, will 
help move the important equitment on a transport."
    Inferno nodded and went to the brig to fetch the three Maximal prisoners. 
In the meantime, Aracnia called Quickstrike and Darkmouse.
    "Quickstrike, Darkmouse, report to the command room now. I want you two 
to go to the ship while were moving. Got it?"
    She turned to Paralysis, "Get Venomus and Solo, Atma, and Pursudeo on the 
Comm too, I want them here!" 
    Paralysis nodded and did as he was told.
